definition: Comprehensive employee and contractor training covering GLBA Privacy Rule, Safeguards Rule, Pretexting Prevention, and organization-specific compliance requirements. Mandatory annual training for all personnel with access to customer information. Training designed to ensure understanding, awareness, and consistent compliance behavior.
official_description: Per GLBA Safeguards Rule Element 3 (16 CFR 314.4(c)) and Privacy Rule (12 CFR 1016.7, 16 CFR 313.7), financial institution must provide security awareness training for all personnel with access to customer information. Training requirement applies to: all employees with customer information access; all contractors/vendors with access; new hire onboarding; annual refresher training; role-specific training for higher-risk positions. Training effectiveness assessed through: completion tracking; knowledge assessments; effectiveness surveys; post-training testing; behavior observation. Training content covers: GLBA requirements and institution obligations; customer information protection and safeguards; privacy rights and notice requirements; unauthorized access prevention; phishing and social engineering; password security and MFA; incident reporting procedures; pretexting prevention; acceptable use policies; data handling practices; consequences of non-compliance. Training modalities: in-person instructor-led; online self-paced; video-based; interactive modules; role-based customization; refresher training; specialized training for IT staff, call center, management. Training documentation: completion records; dates; content covered; assessment results; compliance tracking; regulatory examination evidence.

column26: Per GLBA Safeguards Rule (16 CFR 314.4(c)) and Privacy Rule (12 CFR 1016.7) personnel security requirements, new employees must receive security training before access to customer information. New hire training purpose: ensure understanding of GLBA requirements before access; establish security expectations from day one; prevent incidents through informed employees; document training completion as prerequisite to access.
